as.description: The element or component the PopoverPanel should render as.
as.description_zh: PopoverPanel 应呈现为的元素或组件。

focus.description:
This will force focus inside the PopoverPanel when the Popover is
open. It will also close the Popover if focus left this component.
focus.description_zh:
当 Popover 为
打开。如果焦点离开此组件，它还将关闭 Popover。

static.description:
Whether the element should ignore the internally managed open/closed
state.Note: static and unmount can not be used at the same time. You will
get a TypeScript error if you try to do it.
static.description_zh:
元素是否应忽略内部管理的 open/closed
州。注意：static 和 unmount 不能同时使用。您将
如果尝试这样做，则会收到 TypeScript 错误。

unmount.description:
Whether the element should be unmounted or hidden based on the
open/closed state.Note: static and unmount can not be used at the same time. You will
get a TypeScript error if you try to do it.
unmount.description_zh:
元素应该被卸载还是隐藏，这取决于
打开/关闭状态。注意：static 和 unmount 不能同时使用。您将
如果尝试这样做，则会收到 TypeScript 错误。

slots.name: open
slots.description: Whether or not the popover is open.

slots.name: close
slots.description:
Closes the popover and refocuses PopoverButton. Optionally pass in a
ref or HTMLElement to focus that element instead.
slots.description_zh:
关闭弹出框并重新聚焦 PopoverButton。（可选）传入
ref 或 HTMLElement 来聚焦该元素。
